hero.title: <span1>Front-End</span1> Engineer with <span1>5 years</span1> of experience
hero.subtitle: From concept to scaling, I create all types of web applications.

description.paragraph1: Versatile Front-end Engineer with a product-driven approach, I am experienced in developing SaaS platforms and mobile applications using React.js, Next.js, and React Native.
description.paragraph2: My unique blend of technical skills, UI/UX sensibility, and entrepreneurial mindset enables me to craft user-centric web experiences that not only look great but also drive business growth.

description.paragraph1: Development of the WebPlayer, a Web Component allowing car dealerships to embed media processed by Meero directly on their website.
description.paragraph2: Deployment of the package on NPM with various adapters (Next.js, Vue, ...).

description.paragraph1: Rebranded & scaled a high-performance Vinted scraper.
description.paragraph3: Published mobile applications on both stores & deployed Web app.
description.paragraph4: Optimizing the scraper in terms of cost and stability.

description.paragraph1: Creation of a dating app enabling users to meet instantly in chic locations.
description.paragraph2: Published on both App Store and Play Store.

description.paragraph1: Development of tools for private bankers (creating & managing customer records, online signatures, ...).
Development of a management tool for the French army.
Development of the Back Office enabling operational staff to purchase and ship products.
Architecture and development of the NAVCAM.
Architecture and development of the Niryo Ned & its Vision Set.
description.paragraph2: Development of the Niryo Studio GUI.

description.paragraph1: Developing the Video Summary feature for MediaCentric.
Creating Profile Perfect AI, a SaaS allowing users to create AI-generated photos.
description.paragraph2: All users have to do is upload a few photos of themselves, and the AI will generate a new photo of them.

description.paragraph1: Creating TGV Max Extra, a web application allowing TGV Max subscribers to create alerts and be notified when €0 tickets are available.
description.paragraph2: The application had over 500 users and more than 1000 alerts sent in less than 3 months.

description.paragraph1: Solving multiple Sudoku grids in real-time with a projection of the solution in augmented reality.
description.paragraph2: This project has over 600 stars on GitHub.

description.paragraph1: Creating a simulation environment where a car learns to drive using reinforcement learning.

phelma.title: Master's in Signal and Image Processing

description.paragraph1: Attended courses on various subjects, ranging from general electronics to artificial intelligence, with a particular focus on image processing.
description.paragraph2: Key projects included developing a speech denoising algorithm using Deep Learning and creating a device measuring air quality with online data integration.

description.paragraph1: Studied in the physics-chemistry preparatory course (PCSI/PC*) to prepare for engineering school competitions.
